channel.title: Making a PK Shop 317 cammy pvp source~!
channel.description: Hello! I need help making a pk shop for my server, I need to know how to make making the players in my server spend points with pk points instead of coins. I also need help on how to add a shop that you have to pay with pk points instead of coins. Any tutorial would be great, not rune-locus please. Thanks! =D

item.title: Making a PK Shop 317 cammy pvp source~!
item.dc:creator: @yesimanub yesimanub
item.description:
@yesimanub wrote:

im thinking you already know how to add shops.

so to make it spend pk points instead of coins

  1. you’l need a pk point system.

  2. shopassistant.java

  3. buyfromshopprice method

  4. new case #
    Ex: if (c.myShopId == blah) { c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " blahbal"); }
    with “blah” being shop number (duh)
    and “blahbal” being pk points or whatever point system you have.

  5. handleOtherShop method>New case
    Ex: if (c.myShopId == blah) { if (c.blahbal >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0){ c.blahbah -= getSpecialItemValue(itemID); c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1); c.getItems().resetItems(3823); }
    with “blah” being shop number and “blahbal” being pk points
    so it be like c.pkpoints

  6. Under Speciaitemvalue method
    This will get special point value instead of original coin value
    add new case
    Ex:

Case 1: Return 200;
with “1” being item Id
and “200” being prices

let me know if this helped

Read full topic
